Parameters.Description: Can be found in the help section of your instance, or at the end of your domain e.g. <Act Domain Name>.com/<Act Database Name>

For cloud, enter (for example) apiuk.act.com, apius.act.com, apiau.act.com or apieu.act.com.  For self-hosted, enter your instance domain, including your database name with the addition of "-api" e.g. <Act Domain Name>.com/<Act Database Name>-api

Name: Act!
Description: CRM & Marketing Automation built for small & midsized business success.
